related.meaning: di dalam, kurang dari (tidak lebih dari)

lessons.japanese: 九時以降はテレビを見ないことにしている。
lessons.indonesian: I make it a rule not to watch television after nine o'clock.

lessons.japanese: いつか１０時以降に訪ねてこられませんか。
lessons.indonesian: Why don't you come by sometime after ten?

lessons.japanese: ９時以降に電話した方が安いですか。
lessons.indonesian: Is it cheaper to call after 9:00?

lessons.japanese: ６時以降ならいつでも結構です。
lessons.indonesian: Any time will do so long as it is after six.

lessons.japanese: １６３９年以降日本は外国料理に対して門戸を閉ざした。
lessons.indonesian: After 1639 Japan closed the door to foreign cuisine.

lessons.japanese: １０時以降に朝食は出されないだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Breakfast will not be served after ten o'clock.

lessons.japanese: ２回以降、相手チームの投手も立ち直って、投手戦となった。
lessons.indonesian: After the second innings, the opposing pitcher recovered too, and it turned into a pitching duel.

lessons.japanese: 面会人は午後９時以降病院に留まることはできない。
lessons.indonesian: No visitor can remain in the hospital after 9 p.m.

lessons.japanese: 梅雨入りは来週以降になりそうだ。
lessons.indonesian: It looks like the rainy season is going to start after next week.

lessons.japanese: 私は１０時以降の外出を禁止されている。
lessons.indonesian: I am forbidden to stay out after 10 o'clock.
